name: Escape from... something
description:
Description:

In the game we are a small ghost who like smoking some weird staff. He must unlock the teleport solving the puzzles and then he can pass the level. In the levels are too oponnents which patrols some path. We can running and crouching thanks to which our enemies can hear us louder or quieter. These first levels are not very hard. In the future maybe I will update this game. Right now I had time to create only 3 levels on the Ludum Dare Jam.

Controls:

WSAD + Mouse = Movement

SPACE = Move the obstacle which is above player

SHIFT = Running

CTRL or C or RMB = Crouching (look out to use CTRL because CTRL+W closes the browser tab)

Hint

On level 3 when cuboid lies on the floor it can be pushed only from certain directions.
